1.「なんだ？ 今の光は……。: What the? That light just now...

5.「大変だ！ 姫さまが！ アンルシア姫さまが| お戻りになられたぞーっ！！: Oh, my God! The princess! Princess Anlucia has|returned!

6.「……ふふっ。| どうやら ちゃんと 真の世界に| 到着できたようですね。: ...Hmmm. It seems we have properly arrived at|the true world.

7.「はい。この城こそが 私が生まれ育った場所。| 真のグランゼドーラに 間違いあり: Yes, sir. This castle is where I was born and|raised. The true Gran Zedora, no doubt.

9.「ああ…… 本当に あなたなの？| よかった……。よく 無事で…………。: Oh... is that really you? Thank God you're|okay.

10.「心配かけて ごめんなさい。| でも こうして……| 生きて帰ってくることができ: I'm sorry for worrying you. But in this|way...I was able to come back alive.

11.「姫が帰還したとは まことか？: Is it true that the princess has returned?

14.「魔王軍とのいくさで 行方知れずになって以来| どれほどの体験をなさったのか……: I can't imagine what you have been through|since you went missing in the war with the|Demon King's army.

16.「アリオス王。心して 聞かれるがよい。: King Arios. Listen carefully with all your|heart.

17.「……こちらの アンルシア姫は| 我らが よく知る かつての姫ではない。: This Princess Anlucia is not the Princess we|once knew.

18.「覚醒を迎え…… 勇者として目覚めた| 勇者姫アンルシアどのだ。: She has awakened her true power as a hero and|is now Hero Princess Anlucia.

20.「そ… そうか……。| 天国のトーマも このことを知れば| さぞや よろこんだで: Well, Toma must be proud to see you from|heaven now..

21.<center>アンルシア姫が 勇者として|覚醒を迎えたという報せは|一夜にして: The news of Princess Anlucia's awakening as a|hero princess spread throughout the country|overnight.

22.<center>トーマ王子の死と アンルシア姫の消失に|ふさぎ込んでいた人々は:
The people who had been depressed by the death|of Prince Toma and the disappearance of|Princess Anlucia were now heartily celebrating|
|her return and awakening as a new Hero.

23.<center>ある者は歌い ある者は踊り|人々は 大いに騒いで 歓喜に酔いしれ: Some sang, some danced, some made a great deal|of noise, and the people were excited with|joy...

24.「このたびは 娘が たいへん世話になった。: I would like to thank you for all the help you|have given us.

25.「偽りのレンダーシアなどという世界から| アンルシアを 無事に連れ戻してくれたこ: I can't thank you enough for bringing Anlucia|back safely from the false world of Lendersia.|And as for the future...

26.「アリオス王よ。| その話は 私からしよう。: King Arios. Let me tell you about it.

27.「この世界と 似て非なる もうひとつの世界を| 生みだすとは…… 大魔王マデサゴ: To create to another world so unlike this|one, the Great Demon King Madesagora is a|truly fearsome being.

28.「一見 平和そうに見える この世界にも| 大魔王の魔の手は 確実に伸びている……:
Even in this seemingly peaceful world, the|Great Demon King's evil hand is surely|reaching out... and I want you to find out|
|what it is.

29.「偽りの世界を知る <pc>なら| 他の者たちが 気づけぬ異変にも| 気づけるで: If <pc> knew about the false world,|he would be able to notice things that the|rest of us cannot.

30.「どうだ？ <pc>。| このレンダーシアをめぐり 怪しい現象が| 起きておらぬ: How's that? <pc>. Would you go and|investigate if there are any weird phenomena|going on around this Lendersia?<yesno><close>

31.「ふむ。姫の守りに徹したいと言うのか。| だが アンルシア姫のことは 我らにまか: Hmmm. You want to protect the princess? But|leave Princess Anlucia to us. I ask you to do|what others cannot.

32.「これを そなたに渡しておこう。| 運命の振り子と呼ばれるものでな。| 持つ者を: I give you this. It is called the Pendulum of|Fate. It will guide its bearer to a|singularity of destiny...

33.「そなたが レンダーシアを旅して| 出会った事件を解決することは| 大魔王の狙い: Solving the cases you encounter in your|travels in Lendersia will provide clues to the|Great Demon King's intentions.

34.「同時にそれは この世界の運命をも変えてゆく。| 運命が変わった時 振り子はチカ:
At the same time, it will change the destiny|of this world. When fate changes, the Pendulum|of Fate will gain strength and lead to a|
|greater path of destiny.

35.「運命のチカラで満ちれば 振り子は輝きを放つ。| まずは メルサンディ セレド:
When filled with the power of Fate, the|Pendulum of Fate will shine. First, go to|Melsandy, Celed, and Arahagiro to investigate|
|their anomalies.

37.「ここは 兄の部屋なの……。| 忙しくて あまり部屋にいない人だったけど| ここ: This is my brother's room. He was always busy|and didn't spend much time here, but this|room brings back memories..

39.「兄の葬儀には 出席できなかったけど| 私は 自分の記憶の世界で| ちゃんと 兄: I couldn't attend my brother's funeral, but I|did say goodbye to him in my own world of|memory.

40.「今は 私のために生きてくれた 兄の分まで| しっかり 勇者の使命を 果たさなく:
Now I must fulfill the mission of Hero for my|brother who lived for me! That's right. I must|prepare for the battle against the Great Demon|
|King.

41.「偽りのレンダーシアから 戻る時に使った| その石は きっと <pc>の| これ: I'm sure that the stone you used to return|from False Lendersia will be useful in|<pc>'s future travels!

42.「ふむ……。<pc>さんが| ブレイブストーンを 持つんですか。| それなら す: Hmmm... <pc> has a Brave Stone? That|would take some explaining.

43.「クロウズさん！| 今まで どこに行ってたんですか？| 宴にも出席しないで……。: Claws! Where have you been all this time?|You didn't even attend the banquet...

44.「……ふふっ。| ああいう かしこまった席は 苦手なので| こっそり抜け出して: I'm not that good at formal gatherings, so I|snuck out and explored the castle.

45.「それより <pc>さん。| そのブレイブストーンは 勇者が使えばこそ| 自由に: More importantly, <pc>. The Brave|Stone can only be used by Hero to freely|travel between the two worlds.

46.「<pc>さんが使っても| きっと 何も起こらないと思いますよ。| ただし……: I am sure nothing will happen if <pc>|uses it. However...

47.「このグランゼドーラの 城下町の入り口にもある| てっぺんに翼を生やした 五角形:
You know that pentagonal pillar with wings at|the top that stands at the entrance to the|castle town here in Gran Zedora, the Tower of|
|Courage?

48.「あまり知られていないことですが| あれは いにしえの勇者が その地を守るために: It is a little-known fact that the Hero's|Monument was built by a hero to protect the|land with all it's might.

49.「ブレイブストーンを持って その石塔を調べれば| 勇者のチカラが手助けしてくれ:
If you take the Brave Stone and examine it,|maybe the power of Hero's Monument|will help you, and you can unite the true|
|world with the false.

50.「さて……。<pc>さんの 元気な顔も| 見られましたし 私も この城を出て|: Well... now that I've seen <pc>'s|cheery face, I guess I'll leave this castle to|fulfill my own purpose.

51.「アンルシア姫を この世界に戻すという| 大仕事は終わりましたが まだ やるべき: The great task of bringing Princess Anlucia|back to this world is over, but there is still|much work to be done... so I'll see you soon.

53.「……<pc>。この世界の異変を調べて| 何かわかったら 時々 この城に戻って|:
. If you check the anomalies in|this world and find out anything, I would|like you to come back to this castle|
|from time to time and tell me what's going|on.

54.「さあ こうしては おられん！| すぐに 宴の準備じゃ！ このことを 皆に伝え|:
Come on, we can't stand around here like this!|We must prepare a feast! Let's tell everyone|about this and celebrate her return and|
|awakening!

57.「その間 <pc>は 私の代わりに| この世界の異変を 調べてきてほしいの。|: In the meantime, <pc> would like you|to go and investigate the anomalies in this|world for me. Take this with you.

59.<pc>は 賢者ルシェンダから|運命の振り子（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<m: <pc> received|the Pendulum of Fate (Key Items) from Sage|Lushenda!<me 60>

60.「……アンルシア姫は| 来たるべき 大魔王との戦いに備え| この城に 留まらねば: Princess Anlucia must remain in this castle in|preparation for the coming battle with the|Great Demon King.

61.「姫とは 別行動になるが| そなたなら すばらしい成果を見せてくれると| 期待し: You and the princess will be going your|separate ways, but I know you'll do great|on your own!

62.「<pc>よ。そなたが 旅立つ前に| 渡しておきたいものがある。この後すぐに|: <pc>. I have something for you before|you leave. Will you come and receive it?

63.「これを あなたに渡しておくわ。| 直接 私の部屋に来ることができる| 特別な: I'm giving you this. It's a special Zoomstone|that allows you to come directly to my room.

65.「ルシェンダさまに 作っていただいたのよ。| それがあれば 私に会いに来るのも|: Lushenda created it. I thought it would make|it easier for you to come see me.

66.「じゃあ 私は 自分の部屋に戻るわ。| <pc> 気をつけてね。| あなたの 旅: Okay, I'm going back to my room. <pc>|Take care. I hope you have a safe trip!

67.「ラスカの はしゃぐ声……。| コペおばあさまの焼いた フワフワのパン……。: The sound of Ruska's excited voice... the|fluffy Bread baked by Grandma Kope...

68.「あっ <pc>。| もしかして 今の独り言 聞かれちゃった？: Oh <pc>. Did you hear me talking to|myself just now, by any chance?

69.「……じつはね。メルサンディ村で| 暮らしていたときのことを 思いだしていたの。: ...As a matter of fact. I was remembering the|time when I lived in Melsandy Village.

70.「偽りの世界のこととはいえ| あの村で ミシュアとして過ごした時間は| 何物にも: Even though it was in a false world, the time|I spent as Mishua in that village was an|experience I would not trade for anything.

71.「かつての私は トーマ兄さまや……| 自分の身近な人を 守ることまでしか| 考え: I used to think only of protecting my brother|Toma and those closest to me.

72.「でも メルサンディ村で暮らす中で| 私には たくさんの 守らなきゃいけない人が: But living in Melsandy Village has made me|realize that I have a lot of people to|protect.

73.「メルサンディ村だけじゃない……。| 私は この世界で暮らしている| すべての人: I want to protect not only Melsandy Village...|but all the people who live in this world...

74.「それが 勇者としての 私の役目だわ。| 命に代えても 果たすべきことよ。: That's my role as Hero. It's what I have to|do, even if it costs me my life.

75.「そのためにも あなたのチカラを| 私に 貸してほしいの。| よろしくね <pc: And for that I need you to lend me your|strength. Nice to meet you <pc>!

76.「まさか あれが……？| あの人が 勇者アルヴァンなの……？: You don't think that's...? That's Hero Alvan?

79.「こんな……。あなたは こんな姿で……。: You look like this... you look like this...

80.「あなたのことを追ってきました。| けれど…… ここへ たどり着くまでに| あま: I have been following you. But... so much time|has passed before I arrived here.

81.「覚えていますか。| 私です…… カミルです。: Do you remember me? It's me... Kamil.

83.「遠い昔 私は 自らを迷宮に封じた| あなたを救うために この迷宮に入りました。: Long ago, I entered this labyrinth to save you|who sealed yourself in it.

84.「けれど……迷宮のなかばで 私は息絶えました。| そして 自分が 何者なのかすら: But...in the middle of the labyrinth, I died.|I became a soul wandering in the labyrinth,|having forgotten who I was.

86.「今代の勇者と盟友よ！| どうか あなた達の チカラを貸してください。: Heroes and allies of this generation! Please|lend us your strength.

87.「生者である あなた達の持つ 勇気の輝きは| 魂のチカラ……。禁忌の術で 汚れて:
The spark of courage that you, the living,|possess is the power of the soul... and you|will be able to save Alvan's soul, which has|
|been tainted by the forbidden arts.

94.「ああ アルヴァン……。| こんな…… こんな姿になって……！| あなたは あま: Oh, Alvan... to be like this... like this...!|You're so selfish!

95.「あなたは 私の身代わりになるつもりで| 魔王討伐への出立の日……| 私の竜笛を: You broke my Flute on the day we set out to|defeat the Demon King and left, intending to|take my place, didn't you?

96.「不死の魔王を異世界に封じる| 禁忌の術を 私に使わせないために……。: To prevent me from using the forbidden art of|sealing the immortal Demon King in another|world...

98.「君は…… 盟友としての使命に燃えていた……。| 命を捨てて……禁術を使うことに:
You were so fired up by your mission as an|ally that you were willing to lay down your|life, even to use the forbidden arts... but|
|you were not. But...

99.「僕には それが受け入れられなかった……。| 君を守るためなら……| 命だって…: I couldn't accept that... that I was willing|to... die... to protect you.

101.「本当に 何もわかっていません。| 私は 盟友の使命だと思って| 命を捨てる覚悟: I really don't understand anything. I was not|prepared to lay down my life as a mission for|our ally.

102.「私だって……| あなたの為なら 命は惜しくなかったのです。: I would have given my life for you, too.

105.<center>あの子たちは…… そうか。|今代の 勇者と盟友なんだね。: Those girls... I see. They're allies of this|generation's Hero, aren't they?

106.<center>……ええ。あの子たちも また|誰かと出会い…… 誰かと別れ……|: ...Yeah. Those children will also meet|someone... and part with someone... and weave|a new story.

107.<center>私たちは 見守りましょう。|新しい時代の物語を。: We will watch and wait. The story of a new|era.

108.<center>……ありがとう。|今代の勇者と 盟友よ……。: Thank you. Heroes and allies of this|generation...
